title: Need help with voicemail
content: Using google phone app for visual voicemail on ATT. When I receive a voicemail, it puts a "+" in front of the number but it does not put the "1" since I am in the US. When I click on "voice call" or "text" it tries to connect / send to an international number.  I have not been able to resolve via any settings, or via ATT support.  I was on Verizon for years and used this feature with no issues.  Any help would be appreciated.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
